column1: barkley denham| memorial services for mr. barkley denham will be held on saturday
column4: at 5:00p. m. at sardis baptist church near jewett. bro. ross earl cunningham and bro. jeremy wilson will officate. a meal will be provided for all in the sardis baptist church fellowship hall immediately following the service. mr. barkley passed away on monday
column7: at his residence at lake limestone. a complete obituary will be posted soon.
